title: "DataCleaning"
output: html_document

''' Setup '''
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

''' Load Data '''
```{r}
data <- read.csv("../data/convertcsv.csv")
```

```{r}
# Remove response column
data_cleaned <- data %>% select(-Response)

# Keep only unique context instances
data_unique <- data_cleaned %>% distinct(Context) %>% 
  drop_na()

# Check structure
head(data_unique)


# Save data to csv without index column
write.csv(data_unique, "../data/context_only_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```



```{r}
# Check new cleaned data
new_data <- read.csv("../data/context_only_data.csv")

head(new_data)
```
